title: Chemtrail Dystopia
description: "Once your eyes are open, it's impossible to close them again." The Stand meets Wool in this political thriller, the first installment of the Mike Pocaro series Mike Pocaro is a blogger and an environmentalist. He begins to study chemtrails and what they actually are. He starts taking pictures of the sky around his neighborhood every day to document what he sees. Posting controversial opinions on his blog gets the attention of the Department of Homeland Security and a shadowy organization called Xircort. He is being harassed. Always looking over his back. All of a sudden people are dying in greater numbers, which Mike attests is from the chemtrails The government makes a serious mistake and all hell breaks loose. It's up to Mike and his fellow patriots to piece together the whole conspiracy.
author: Ryan Cek
